column4: just installed latest ubuntu, and performed all updates, I need 2.8.24 for a wireless driver, whats the best method to update to this kernel - is it in any repo?
there is no 2.8 kernel, you probably mean 2.6.24 in which case you already have 2.6.27 wiht intrepid
